name: Offers.com
overview:
Award-winning Offers.com was named the 2009 Innovative Publisher by LinkShare and received Commission Junctions Publishers Choice Award for 2009. Offers.com is the place where consumers can save time and money on over 7,000 of the best offers from over 1,500 stores and partners. Offers are organized by travel, services, As Seen on TV and retail stores. Consumers can find different ways to save, including promos, coupons and coupon codes, clearance items, free trials and free offers. They can easily search, browse, compare and review offers to find the best ones for their needs. Offers are verified, reviewed, ranked and updated daily by the Offers.com editorial team. Users can watch offers and stores with a My Offers Lockerâ„¢ and receive updates when new offers are updated or added. Users of the Offers.com Firefox Add-on are notified when there is a valid offer for stores they are visiting online.

Offers.com is privately funded and based in Austin, Texas. Offers.com is a Charter Corporate Member of the Performance Marketing Alliance (PMA), and CEO Steve Schaffer serves as president of the PMA board of directors.

funding_rounds.source_description: Offers.com Raises $7 Million To Help Track Down Good Deals (No, Not Like Groupon)
